transArray.content:
No matter which city you visit on a business trip, the All Seasons Hotel is your first choice.
The hotel service is attentive and thoughtful, the bedding is clean and comfortable, and the room is fresh and odor-free.
The room is warmly decorated and the bathroom is separated into dry and wet areas. Itâ€™s a great experience.
Like the details, tea set, tea
The toilet seat in the bathroom is heated
The location is quiet and the transportation is convenient. I really recommend it! !

Dear guest, thank you for your review of the hotel! The store strictly implements the cleaning and hygiene standards required by the brand, and disinfects in time to ensure that customer supplies are replaced every time. The store's products are currently the latest iterations, including Zhepin tea sets, Lapsang Souchong tea, and Zhenghe Peony white tea. . . The store is 800 meters away from the subway entrance and adjacent to the high-end community of Zhongguancun, making it a quiet place in the middle of the hustle and bustle! Looking forward to your patronage again!
